A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There are some flaws with this movie. There are plot holes\,and some characters are not used enough(Snoke). Why most people\,I have realized\, don't like this movie is because the characters are different. For example\, Luke is drastically different from his 4\,5\,6 character. Though\,this is to be expected. Luke has been isolated for years\,and has not accepted his role as an legendary figure in the galaxy.Thus\,his view on force users are shifted and he shuts himself out from the force. The main thing is that this movie wants is to forget 4\,5\,6.This is causing many fans to be mad at this movie.I enjoyed this movie. The one scene that I don't like is when Leia so shows survives the vacuum of space.
